summary: An evil Queen banishes a flower loving troll named Stanley (Dom DeLuise) to New York City, where he befriends two young children.
cast: Dom DeLuise|Cloris Leachman|Charles Nelson Reilly|Jonathan Pryce|Hayley Mills|Phillip Glasser|Tawny Sunshine Glover|Neil Ross|Will Ryan|Pat Musick|Frank Zambetti|Scott Menville|Kath Soucie
keywords: world trade center|hand drawn animation|traditional animation|movie flop|five word title
title: El jardín mágico de Stanley
